ygData.subject: On the Moon
ygData.msgSnippet: About the mobile ship buisness, after having talked it over with the council, we have decided that mobile ships are fine, as long as they are not built or used

Subject: On the Moon
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

About the mobile ship buisness, after having talked it over with the council, 
we have decided that mobile ships are fine, as long as they are not built or 
used as a base. Meaning, shuttles, transport ships, ships like Phobia has, 
pods, etc... are fine, and can have CR chambers in them, but I can't launch 
the Alliance base into the atmosphere (althoug it has flight capability), and 
be going with the rules.

::Ramulus::

Ramulus nods. "There's plenty of spare parts around here, we could use them."

He sighs, thinking about Fliq. "There's an option for repairing Fliq, 
though," Ramulus says, looking back at the shuttle, "My spark is a transmetal 
2. It has regeneration capabilities, and it probably would be able to fix 
him. But to do that, we'd need to put it into his body..."
